com.jme3.scene.plugins.blender.textures.blending
Class TextureBlenderDDS

All Implemented Interfaces:
TextureBlender
public class TextureBlenderDDS
extends java.lang.Object

The class that is responsible for blending the following texture types:

  • DXT1
  • DXT3
  • DXT5 Not yet supported (but will be):
  • DXT1A:

    Method Detail

    blend

    public Texture blend(float[] materialColor,
                     Texture texture,
                     float[] color,
                     float affectFactor,
                     int blendType,
                     boolean neg,
                     BlenderContext blenderContext)
    Description copied from interface: TextureBlender
    This method blends the given texture with material color and the defined color in 'map to' panel. As a result of this method a new texture is created. The input texture is NOT.

    Parameters:
    materialColor - the material diffuse color
    texture - the texture we use in blending
    color - the color defined for the texture
    affectFactor - the factor that the color affects the texture (value form 0.0 to 1.0)
    blendType - the blending type
    blenderContext - the blender context
    Returns:
    new texture that was created after the blending
